IPL98 Global C and C++ enums, definitions, structs etc.


Modules

IPL98 Macro definitions with the #define directive (global)
IPL98 Type enumerations and definitions (global)
 Basic definitions used in all parts of IPL98 These are generic types and in case of a given bit-size must comply with the given size of each type.


Defines

#define PI   3.1415926535897932384626433832795
#define PI2   6.283185307179586476925286766559
#define k_Sqr(x)   ((x)*(x))
#define k_Max(x, y)   ((x)>(y) ? (x) : (y))
#define k_Min(x, y)   ((x)<(y) ? (x) : (y))
#define k_Round(x)   ((x)<0 ? (int)(x-0.5) : (int)(x+0.5))
#define k_RoundUINT8(x)   ((x)<0 ? 0 : ((x>255) ? 255 : (UINT8)(x+0.5)))
